name: OMNIPOTENT - 2DShooter Project
description:
This is my Project for CAS 117 2D Shooter Project.

Modifications:

1) Background Music

2) Created All Backgrounds for each level, including Main Menu

3) Created new Buttons

4) Drew all-new Enemies, a new player, and a new Boss.

5) Created a new Boss Prefab and drew "Tooth Fairy" Character from scratch.

All art and games listed are created by Cameryn Hatfield.
